articles.author: Debby Wu, Dina Bass, Yoolim Lee
articles.title: Tech Firms From Dell to HP Warn of Memory Chip Squeeze From AI - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Dell Technologies Inc., HP Inc. and other tech companies are warning of potential memory-chip supply shortages in the coming year due to soaring demand from the buildout of artificial intelligence infrastructure.
articles.content: Dell Technologies Inc., HP Inc. and other tech companies are warning of potential memory-chip supply shortages in the coming year due to soaring demand from the buildout of artificial intelligence in… [+350 chars]
